item.title: Responsive HTML5 Video Gallery
item.description: External videos To display YouTube, Vimeo and Wistia, videos, you just need to paste the video URL, or share URL of the video in the data-src attribute. The same way you display images in the gallery. lightGallery will check the data-src attribute and if it is a video URL, it will create the respective video slide. You can also provide poster image for each videos. Poster images will be loaded instead of videos.
